text: "Running Up That Hill" is a song by English singer-songwriter Kate Bush from her fifth studio album, Hounds of Love (1985). When it was released, "Running Up That Hill" reached number three on the UK Singles Chart and number 30 on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States. The song was the main theme song for the 1986 BBC 1 children's drama serial, Running Scared. In 2012, a remix of this song premiered during that year's Olympic closing ceremony. In 2022, "Running Up That Hill" became popular again when it was heard in the fourth season of the Netflix series Stranger Things. This made the song the top five on the Billboard Hot 100 and topping the charts in eight countries. ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Kate Bush songs Category:Kim Petras songs Category:Rita Ora songs Category:Within Temptation songs Category:Placebo (band) songs Category:Art pop songs Category:Art rock songs Category:Synth-pop songs
title: Running Up That Hill
